Name: LU 699 - Zoning, BAYCHESTER SQUARE, Bronx (C 170223 ZSX)
Title: Resolution approving a motion to file pursuant to withdrawal of the application regarding the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170223 ZSX (L.U. No. 699), for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-531 of the Zoning Resolution to modify the requirements of Section 36-12 (Maximum Size of Accessory Group Parking Facilities) to allow an accessory group parking facility with a maximum capacity of 1169 spaces; and Section 36-11 (General Provisions) to allow some of such off-street parking spaces to be located on the roof of a building; in connection with a proposed mixed-use development on a property located at 1769-1771 East Gun Hill Road (Block 4804, part of Lot 100), in a C4-3 District, within a large-scale general development, Community District 12, Borough of the Bronx.

History.Description: This Resolution was Filed by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Filed, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
History.AgendaNote: Coupled to be Filed Pursuant to Letter of Withdrawal
History.MinutesNote: Filed pursuant to a Letter of Withdrawal.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}{\f2\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset162{\*\fname Courier New;}Courier New TUR;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\par
\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on June 21, 2017 its decision dated June 21, 2017 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by Gun Hill Square, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-531 of the Zoning Resolution to modify the requirements of: \f1\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\tx1440\f0 1.\tab Section 36-12 (Maximum Size of Accessory Group Parking Facilities) to allow an accessory group parking facility with a maximum capacity of 1169 spaces; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li1440\qj\tx1440\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\tx1440 2.\tab  Section 36-11 (General Provisions) to allow some of such off-street parking spaces to be located on the roof of a building; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx1440\f0 in connection with a proposed mixed-use development on a property located at 1769-1771 East Gun Hill Road (Block 4804, part of Lot 100), in a C4-3 District, within a large-scale general development. This amendment in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the development of a new pedestrian-oriented open-air urban shopping complex and a single residential building containing approximately 180 units of affordable senior housing in the Baychester neighborhood of the Bronx, (ULURP No. C 170223 ZSX), Community District 12, Borough of the Bronx (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications C 170217 PPX (L.U. No. 694), a disposition of City-owned property; C 170218 ZMX (L.U. No. 695), a zoning map amendment changing from an M1-1 District to a C4-3 District; N 170219 ZRX (L.U. No. 696), a zoning text amendment to allow a physical culture or health establishment and to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area; C 170221 ZSX (L.U. No. 697), a special permit to allow the location of buildings without regard for height, setback, and rear yard requirements within a large-scale general development; and C 170222 ZSX (L.U. No. 698), a special permit to modify signage requirements within a large-scale general development; \par
WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission has made the findings required pursuant to Section 74-531 of\cf1  t\cf0 he Zoning Resolution of the City of New York;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on July 17, 2017;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and environmental implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Final Environmental Impact Statement (FEIS) for which a Notice of Completion was issued on June 9, 2017 (CEQR No. 14DME010X).  The FEIS includes (E) designations to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to noise and hazardous materials (E-410);\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\tab WHEREAS, by submission dated August 8, 2017, and submitted to the City Council on August 9, 2017, the applicant withdrew the application.\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\tab The Council approves the motion to file pursuant to withdrawal in accordance with Rules 6.40a, 7.90 and 11.80 of the Rules of the Council.\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\cf1\par
\pard\ltrpar\sa240\qj\cf0 Adopted.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li360\sa120\tab\tab I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on August 9, 2017, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
